con:testSuite.name: TestSuite

con:testCase.name: Employees TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [Employees] located at [/api/v1/employees]

con:config.script: import jxl.* import jxl.write.* WritableWorkbook workbook = Workbook.createWorkbook(new File("C:/SOAPUI/Project/testProject.xls")) WritableSheet sheet = workbook.createSheet("Worksheet 1", 0) log.info(sheet1.isHidden()) Label label = new Label(0, 2, "Test data in Column A, Row 3"); //column=0=A,row=0=1 sheet.addCell(label); Label label1 = new Label(2, 2, "Column C, Row 3"); sheet.addCell(label1); workbook.write() workbook.close()
